entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:39 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 1:41 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 96.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:06 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 1:06 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 1:06 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
